xur.description: A peddler of strange curios, Xûr's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.
xur.subtitle: Agent of the Nine

sales.name: Exotic Engram
sales.subtitle: Exotic Engram
sales.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any remain to be collected; otherwise, it contains a random piece of Exotic armor.

costs.name: Legendary Shards
costs.description: Remnants of powerful items. Used to improve gear or trade for other items.
costs.source: Obtained from dismantling Legendary and Exotic quality items.

sales.name: A Question
sales.subtitle: Exotic Quest Step
sales.description:
Complete strikes or win matches in Crucible or Gambit.

Extra progress is awarded for more challenging activities and for succeeding with clanmates.
